http://makingaustraliahappy.abc.net.au/

Eight volunteers. Three experts. Eight weeks. One vision. 

For the first time ever in Making Australia Happy, the latest and most fascinating research from the science of happiness has been compiled, consolidated and taken for a test drive on the suburban streets of Sydney. Three of Australiaâs leading experts have been set the challenge: take eight people from Australia's unhappiest area and give them the tools to become happier.

"Eight volunteers. Three experts. Eight weeks. One vision."

aren't they the lyrics to a Queen song?
